title: What are some not westernized Kpop groups? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pretty much every k-pop group has some degree of westernization. However, I would say the relatively cute/innocent/nice groups are generally the least western, particularly the ones that use mostly Korean producers. Really, just look at the groups that smash on the Korean digital charts but don’t do much on Youtube. This would include groups like Block B, Highlight, Seventeen, GFriend, Mamamoo, and APink. I’ve also found westerners have a hard time with large (>7) member groups like EXO and Twice.
